description: For Licensed Product(s) Subscription Services to access Origin/Destination Passenger Data (hereafter referred to as \u201cthe data services solution\u201d).
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
================================================Recognizer-ready-structure=============================================

**Notification ID**: T8156-220035

**Issuing Agency**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**Publication Date**: November 30, 2022

**Closing Date**: December 23, 2022, 2:00 PM (EST)

**Background**: Transport Canada seeks to acquire a subscription-based Licensed Product(s) service for accessing Origin/Destination Passenger Data, a solution that must meet specific technical requirements outlined in the attached Statement of Work (Annex A).

**Solicitation Highlights**:
* The successful bidder will be awarded a contract from January 1, 2023 to March 31, 2023, with the option to extend the term by four periods of one year each.
* Bidders must submit their proposals via Ariba link: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14728291.
* The contract's objective is to securely access, process, and integrate Origin/Destination Passenger Data, satisfying Transport Canada's information needs.

* **Technical Requirements**: The bidder's proposal must adhere to the technical requirements specified in the attached Statement of Work (Annex A). The selected solution must provide a reliable, scalable, and secure data services solution, accessible to Transport Canada users.

* **Trade Agreements**: The procurement is subject to the terms and conditions of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

* **Contracting Entity**: The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is responsible for managing this procurement process.

* **End User**: Transport Canada (TC) will be the primary end-user of the Origin/Destination Passenger Data solution.

* **Contact Information**: Robert Picco, PSPC, can be reached at robert.picco2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for further information or clarification.

**Attachment**: The Statement of Work (Annex A) detailing the technical requirements and evaluation criteria is available within the solicitation.

**Bid Submission**: Bids must be submitted electronically through the Ariba link provided. Late submissions will not be accepted.

Note to readers: This rewritten entry follows a clear and concise format, while Including only the most relevant information. It has been edited to eliminate unnecessary details and awkward phrasing. -- this document should be a good template for future notifications. Grammar and spellings have been corrected. 
_______________________________________________________
